name: ZooM (itch) (LynxJSA)
description:
On your mark... Get set... GO! 

Keys: 

  • Z for red snail
  • M for blue snail

Race your snail to the finish line by pressing your key as quickly as possible.

Background: 

This game was created in 2019 by my two sons, Gio(13) and Niko(7), as a Mother's Day present for their Mom. It was their first attempt to create a game - from design to deployment - with little or no outside help. Gio, my eldest, asked if we could put it on our itch.io page so that other people could see it and play it. 

The language/app used to create it was AppGameKit which is probably one of the most underrated game development environments on the PC platform. A trial version is currently available. Check it out! 

Gio and Niko wanted to share their design document and the AGK source code as free downloads. If you would like the Windows EXE version (it is the same as the version you can play on this page, but in EXE form), there is a nominal charge. All proceeds will probably end up going to Pokemon cards. :)
